queries.select: select a.EQUIP_ID as GSC100장비ID , a.EQUIP_NM as GSL200장비명 , a.equip_tid_val as GSL200장비TID , b.equip_port_id as DSC120포트ID , b.port_desc as DSL150포트설명 , c.equip_cons_itm_nm as GSL200카드명 from oiv10100 a , oiv10400 b , oiv10210 c where a.equip_tid_val like '%CR_' and a.equip_id = c.equip_id and a.equip_id = b.equip_id and c.equip_cons_itm_id = b.equip_cons_itm_id order by a.equip_id, c.equip_cons_itm_nm
